column4: anyone know how to get nvidia gt 240 card to work? if I install nvidia drivers, then tty and run nvidia-xconfig, or build from source, or try any driver including the beta driver x won't start any ideas how to fix it?
did you try system>admin>hardware drivers yet?
yes, I used Jockey to install the drivers, then droped to tty and ran nvidia-xconfig, then rebooted and x won't start
did you change xconfig as root?
